title: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When exporting a Zip in a workspace with many projects, the updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor.
OB: When exporting a Zip, the checkboxes are not displayed with a busy cursor during the update process.
EB: During the update process, the checkboxes should display a busy cursor to indicate that the update is in progress.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Click on the 'Export Zip' option.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Click 'Ok' to initiate the export process.
